segments.text: We are interested in placing a large order for your wool carpet .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: 10,000 sq . m . You should give us a discount for such a large quantity .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: A higher discount will be given for a big order , so we are willing to give you a 5 % discount this time .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The Iranians will give us a 10 % discount if such a high order is placed with them . No doubt you know an incentive discount encourages the buyers and helps expand seller's business .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Of course I know . But there is too high a rate . Frankly speaking , the maximum discount we can make is 6 % .
segments.speaker: S2
